sentences.english: However, Huili Conference had influenced Zhang Wentian and Peng Dehuai to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 會理會議也給張聞天和彭德懷帶來一定影響。
中國長號大號協會理事。

sentences.english: Presently is the Chinese clothing designer association director, popular tendency researcher.
sentences.chinese: 現爲中國服裝設計師協會理事，流行趨勢研究員。

sentences.english: It is governing unit of China Sewing Machinery Association.
sentences.chinese: 公司是中國縫製機械協會理事單位。

sentences.english: So it's like you can unemotionally analyze some source of deep joy in your life.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說可能會理地探索到生中的歡樂的來源。

sentences.english: The book could have been better.
sentences.chinese: 這本書本來可能會理好。

sentences.english: My company has become the first session of the China International Association Rotational units.
sentences.chinese: 我公司已成爲第一屆中國國際滾塑協會理事單位。

sentences.english: The breeding pig farm of the company is the council member of the All China Mechanic Pig Raising Association.
sentences.chinese: 該公司種豬場是全國機械化養豬協會理事單位。

sentences.english: Is the Henan domesticated fowl industry association director unit.
sentences.chinese: 是河南家禽業協會理事單位。

sentences.english: People are buying holiday gift of food and who listens to her?
sentences.chinese: 人們都在買節日的食品和禮物，有誰會理她呢？
